00002  * CMessageBox.cpp
00003  *
00004  *  Created on: 04.12.2009
00005  *      Author: gerstrong
00006  */

00008 #include "CMessageBox.h"
00009 #include "../sdl/CVideoDriver.h"
00010 #include "../sdl/CInput.h"
00011 #include "../graphics/CGfxEngine.h"
00012 #include "../StringUtils.h"
00013 
00014 CMessageBox::CMessageBox(const std::string& Text, bool lower, bool keymsg, bool leftbound) :
00015 m_mustclose(false),
00016 m_keymsg(keymsg),
00017 m_twirltimer(0),
00018 m_twirlframe(0)
00019 {
00020  // Split up the text in lines, so can calculate the textbox height
00021  size_t width=0; // determined by checking if the text is getting wider
00022 
00023  std::string buf = "";
00024  for( size_t i=0 ; i<Text.size() ; i++ )
00025  {
00026   if( endofText(Text.substr(i)) )
00027   {
00028    if( width<buf.size() ) width=buf.size();
00029 
00030    m_Lines.push_back(buf);
00031    buf.clear();
00032   }
00033   else
00034    buf += Text[i];
00035  }
00036 
00037  size_t pos = 0;
00038  if(!buf.empty())
00039   while( (pos = buf.find('\n')) != std::string::npos )
00040    buf.erase(pos,1);
00041  m_Lines.push_back(buf);
00042  if( width<buf.size() ) width=buf.size();
00043 
00044  if(m_keymsg)
00045  {
00046   m_Lines.push_back("");
00047   buf = "Press any KEY/BUTTON  ";
00048   if( width<buf.size() ) width=buf.size();
00049   else
00050   {
00051    size_t trail = width-buf.size();
00052    buf.insert(0,trail,' ');
00053   }
00054   m_Lines.push_back(buf);
00055  }
00056 
00057  // try to center that dialog box
00058  m_gamerect = g_pVideoDriver->getGameResolution();
00059 
00060  int h = m_gamerect.h;
00061  m_gamerect.x = m_gamerect.w/2;
00062  m_gamerect.y = m_gamerect.h/2;
00063 
00064  m_gamerect.h = (m_Lines.size()+2)*8;
00065  m_gamerect.w = (width+2)*8;
00066 
00067  m_gamerect.x -= m_gamerect.w/2;
00068 
00069  if(!lower)
00070   m_gamerect.y -= m_gamerect.h/2;
00071  else
00072   m_gamerect.y = h-m_gamerect.h;
00073 
00074  if(leftbound) m_gamerect.x = 0;
00075 
00076 
00077  m_gamerect.h /= 8;
00078  m_gamerect.w /= 8;
00079 
00080  mp_DlgFrame = new CDlgFrame(m_gamerect.x, m_gamerect.y,
00081         m_gamerect.w, m_gamerect.h, DLG_THEME_VORTICON);
00082 }
00083 
00084 // This function is used in your Ship need those parts.
00085 // This special Messagebox can hold up to 4 images
00086 void CMessageBox::addTileAt(Uint16 tile, Uint16 x, Uint16 y)
00087 {
00088  TileHolder tileholder;
00089 
00090  tileholder.tile = tile;
00091  tileholder.x = x;
00092  tileholder.y = y;
00093 
00094  m_Tiles.push_back(tileholder);
00095 }
00096 
00097 #define TWIRL_TIME 5
00098 void CMessageBox::process()
00099 {
00100  SDL_Surface *sfc = g_pVideoDriver->FGLayerSurface;
00101 
00102  // Look, if somebody pressed a button, and close this dialog!
00103  if(g_pInput->getPressedAnyCommand()) {
00104   m_mustclose = true;
00105   return;
00106  }
00107 
00108  // Draw the empty Dialog Box
00109  mp_DlgFrame->draw(sfc);
00110 
00111  // Draw the Text on our surface
00112  for( size_t i=0 ; i<m_Lines.size() ; i++)
00113   g_pGfxEngine->getFont(0).drawFont(sfc, m_Lines[i], m_gamerect.x+8, m_gamerect.y+((i+1)*8) );
00114 
00115  // Draw additional tiles on the surface if any where defined
00116  for(size_t i=0 ; i<m_Tiles.size() ; i++) {
00117   g_pGfxEngine->getTileMap(1).drawTile(sfc, m_gamerect.x+m_Tiles[i].x,
00118         m_gamerect.y+m_Tiles[i].y, m_Tiles[i].tile);
00119  }
00120 
00121  if(m_keymsg)
00122  {
00123   // Draw the twirl
00124   if( m_twirltimer >= TWIRL_TIME )
00125   {
00126    m_twirltimer = 0;
00127    if(m_twirlframe >= 7)
00128     m_twirlframe=0;
00129    else
00130     m_twirlframe++;
00131   }
00132   else m_twirltimer++;
00133   g_pGfxEngine->getCursor()->draw( sfc, m_twirlframe,
00134     mp_DlgFrame->m_x+(mp_DlgFrame->m_w-16),
00135     mp_DlgFrame->m_y+(mp_DlgFrame->m_h-16));
00136  }
00137 
00138 
00139 }
00140 
00141 bool CMessageBox::isFinished()
00142 { return m_mustclose; }
00143 
00144 CMessageBox::~CMessageBox() {
00145  delete mp_DlgFrame;
00146 }
